meta.title: Omkarnath Dubey | Frontend Developer
meta.description: Portfolio of Omkarnath Dubey, a Frontend Developer specializing in responsive design, UI/UX, and performance optimization.

hero.name: Omkarnath Dubey
hero.tagline: Crafting responsive, high-performance, and visually stunning web experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a dedicated Frontend Developer with hands-on experience in building modern, user-centric web applications. With a background in Information Technology and a passion for clean code, I specialize in transforming designs into functional, responsive websites using the latest web technologies.

items.title: Global Leadership Summit 2026
items.description: Frontend development for an international, high-traffic event website. Implemented responsive layouts, optimized page load performance, and ensured SEO-friendly structure.

items.title: NextGen Vidhya
items.description: Live education platform. Implemented UI enhancements and integrated backend APIs.

items.title: NextGen Techno Website
items.description: Corporate website development. Improved website responsiveness and visual consistency.

items.title: Mitra Fintech
items.description: Developed and maintained frontend modules for a fintech platform. Collaborated with backend teams for seamless data integration.

items.title: Spark Women (Android Sim)
items.description: Interactive simulation of an Android safety app. Features SOS alerts, location tracking, and emergency contact management.

items.title: Spark Master
items.description: Static website platform focused on women empowerment content and community resources.

items.title: Enterprise Dashboard UI
items.description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard for large-scale data visualization, featuring real-time updates and customizable widgets.

items.title: E-Commerce Platform
items.description: A headless e-commerce frontend built for performance and SEO, integrating with Shopify API.

items.title: Corporate Banking Portal
items.description: Secure and accessible banking interface designed for high-net-worth individual management.

details: Contributed to frontend development for multiple live projects.
Implemented responsive layouts and optimized user interfaces.
Collaborated with the team to ensure consistent UI/UX across modern browsers.
